testmod-SpacePotion.NAME: Bottled Space
DESCRIPTIONS: #yPotion slot(s). If you don't have #yAlchemist, you will not gain slots if you have #b10 or more slots, instead, gain same amount of random potions.

testmod-TimePotion.NAME: Essence of Kronos
DESCRIPTIONS: End your turn, enemies will not perform their intent this turn, then start your next turn.

testmod-TestPotion.NAME: Essence of Test
DESCRIPTIONS: time(s) to add to your hand, it costs #b0 this turn.
